title: Ocean Token Distribution
description: Get on the whitelist for the Ocean Token distribution during the network launch on … March 2019. The KYC process is open until … 2019.

platforms.name: CoinList
list: are registering for the first time
have an existing CoinList or AngelList account
have participated in Filecoin, Blockstack, Origin or any other project run by CoinList

platforms.name: Fractal
list: participated in the Ocean Protocol Seed or Pre-Launch phase in March 2018
prefer your data to be stored exclusively in the EU under GDPR

tokeninfo.title: The Ocean Token
tokeninfo.description: The Ocean Tokens (Ocean) are used on the Ocean Protocol network as the means of value exchange, to power the protocol and incentivize the keeper nodes of the network.
metrics: No minimum, no maximum individual contribution limit
Token price will be determined at network launch
